name: Click (ThreeS Studio)
description:
The game is dedicated to strengthening the human skill in discovering hidden numbers among a group of similar elements, as the process of discovering hidden numbers is one of the criteria for intelligence measures(IQ).
-This is the second part of our previous game A_Cube .
-the way of playing:
All you have to do is click on the hidden parts of the number, after you know the hidden number. Or write that number in the space provided, to cross to the next stage.
The game consists of 41 different levels in terms of difficulty and configuration, some levels require you to click on the parts of the number that you discover, and other parts require you to write the number that you discover.
